tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE encrypted_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    encrypted_text VARCHAR(255),
    encryption_key VARCHAR(50),
    transmission_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE encrypted_info (
    info_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    encrypted_data_id INT,
    encryption_key_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (encrypted_data_id) REFERENCES encrypted_data(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (encryption_key_id) REFERENCES encryption_keys(key_id)
);
